Name of Reporting: Employer: Republic Silver State Disposal, Inc.
12. Explain fully the circumstances of a: An agreement to pay for labor relations advice regarding an organizational effort by the Teamsters beginning in February 2017 with the filing of a Representation Petition. Charges incurred were billed at an hourly rate of $375, plus reasonable and ordinary expenses such as travel, lodging and food. Specific assistance included speaking with employees and preparing literature for employees to review regarding the process and issues involved in collective bargaining and the reasons why the Company believes it is neither in its best interests nor the best interests of its employees to bring a union into the workplace. Payments were made in 2017 under this agreement .
